title: Ravenna Park Studio
posting_body: Very roomy, clean, light-filled studio apartment in the Ravenna neighborhood.
It is big and bright with good size spaces.
Check out the extra-large closet & big laundry room/storage.
Kitchen has good counter space, plenty of cabinets, range/oven, dishwasher, disposal and breakfast bar open to living area.
The apartment is located about ¼ miles north of Ravenna/Cowen Park in a quiet charming neighborhood.
Easy biking distance to UW campus and to bus lines to everywhere.
The neighborhood is populated with nice restaurants, shops and has a walk score of 95.
Close to shopping, freeway access and transportation to downtown Seattle.
•	Washer and dryer located inside the unit
Written minimum rental criteria, available by request and posted in the unit, includes adequate income, references, and credit.
Tenant pays addl $90 p/person for water/garbage and all electric utilities + $10 covered parking fee.
Due to very cooperative tenant, all showings are by appointment.
